Title: Mama Said
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Kent Osborne, Kristen Mukai, Kent Osborne (story), Pendleton Ward (story), Jack Pendarvis (story), Gilbert Hernandez (story), Adam Muto (story)
Actors: Ako Castuera, Andrew Daly, John DiMaggio, Jack Pendarvis
Plot: Finn and Jake's loyalty is questioned when King of Ooo sends the duo on a mission to catch flying mushrooms.
